title: Strictly's Dianne Buswell shares adorable look at morning routine with Joe Sugg
text:
Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing star Dianne Buswell has given fans a sneak peak at her relationship with boyfriend Joe Sugg .

The beautiful redhead took to her Instagram story with a short comic strip, showing how Joe pulls her back into bed for a cuddle when she's trying to leave for work.

The 30 year-old dancer is up and ready to head to the dance studio before Joe's even stirred.

She goes to give her sleepy man a kiss before she heads off.

"I'm going to work, bye," says the cartoon Dianne.

"No," Joe mumbles, before he drags her down onto the bed and wraps his arms about her.

(Image: Can Nguyen/REX/Shutterstock)

Dianne yields: "Alright. Good night."

She's known for being dedicated to her role as a pro dancer on Strictly and rocking up early, and she's been putting her skills to good use with new partner Dev Griffin .

Last year saw her partnered with Joe, and the two struck up a romance in the aftermath of the show.

Dev's proving to be a worthy partner for Dianne, as the pair rocketed to second place on the Strictly leaderboard after Movie Night.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

They wowed the judges with an Aladdin-themed routine, despite Dianne's nasty fall the day before after Dev reportedly dropped her on her head during training.

They're only trailing behind Oti Mabuse and her celeb partner, Emmerdale's Kelvin Fletcher - their lead is made all the more impressive as Kelvin was a late stand-in for the injured Made In Chelsea star, Jamie Laing.

Dianne also filmed herself and Dev after a hard day's work, but before heading back out for an appearance on Strictly spin-off, It Takes Two .

Dianne and Dev start belting out Marvin Gaye and Kim Weston's hit, It Takes Two.

"Oh, wow, nice voice there, Dev," Dianne admires.

The DJ laughs: "Got a bit carried away there."

Dianne says: "We've been working so hard all day, but we're off to It Takes Two now."

She the forgets when the show airs, chuckling: "I'll get back to you on the time."
description: Dianne took to her Instagram story to give fans a glimpse of how Joe pulls her back into bed for a cuddle before she leaves for work
